course_description: This course provides instruction in diction usage by solo singers and includes the study of Introduction to International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) as applied to English and Italian. It focuses on the special needs and considerations for diction utilized by singers.
sections: Class Nbr: 1312, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: B. Howard, Status: Open
